channel.title: Hiddens on Spencer Chang
channel.description: Recent content in Hiddens on Spencer Chang

item.title: learning to move on
item.description: dear reader, if you’re receiving this it means that i wanted to share some news with you because i trust you to hold space for it the way i would want it to be held and received. this is not edited and very raw, so forgive any hanging thoughts or otherwise. please don’t share the link without permission. last wednesday I was laid off from coda as the company cut 19% of employees.
